Some ppl have asked how to send #IOTA to an #IOTA address from the @delion_io app. You need to enable 2FA authentication to do this. From Account settings on the left, select Security settings. Scan QR code with your authenticator app, enter your delion pwd, enter 2FA code.  https://t.co/bvvOUCnMw3
